line2.description: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

city.description: City, district, suburb, town, or village.

state.description: For US-addressed the 2-letter State abbreviation. For international-addresses the county, providence, or region.

allOf.description: Company business address (must be in the US; no PO box or virtual/forwarding addresses allowed).
